    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    App
    Main application class for the MiniStore application.
    AutoSetup
    Utility class for automatic setup of the MiniStore application.
    Basket
    A collection of products, used to record the products that are to be wished to be purchased.
    BetterBasket
    Enhanced version of Basket with additional functionalities.
    CashierController
    Controller class for the cashier interface.
    CashierModel
    Model class for the cashier interface.
    CustomerController
    Controller class for the customer interface.
    CustomerModel
    Model class for the customer interface.
    DashboardController
    Controller class for the staff dashboard interface.
    DBAccess
    Base class that defines the access to the database driver
    DBAccessFactory
    Manages the starting up of the database.
    F_Order
    Facade for the order processing handling which is implemented on the middle tier.
    F_StockR
    Facade for remote read access to the stock list.
    F_StockRW
    Facade for read/write access to the stock list.
    LocalMiddleFactory
    Provide access to middle tier components.
    Main
    Main class for launching the MiniStore application.
    MiddleFactory
    Provide access to middle tier components.
    MinistoreStartController
    Controller class for the MiniStore start interface.
    Names
    Location of the various objects accessed remotely.
    OrderException
    Exception throw if there is an error in the order processing system.
    OrderProcessing
    Defines the interface for accessing the order processing system.
    OrderState
    Enum representing the different states of an order in the cashier interface.
    OrderState
    Enum representing the different states of an order in the stock management interface.
    PackingController
    Controller class for the packing interface.
    PackingModel
    Model class for the packing interface.
    Product
    Used to hold the following information about a product: Product number, Description, Price, Stock level.
    R_Order
    The order processing handling.
    R_StockR
    Remote implementation of the StockReader interface.
    R_StockRW
    Remote implementation of the StockReadWriter interface.
    RemoteMiddleFactory
    Provide access to middle tier components.
    RemoteOrder_I
    Defines the RMI interface for the Order object.
    RemoteStockR_I
    Defines the RMI interface for read access to the stock object.
    RemoteStockRW_I
    Defines the RMI interface for read/write access to the stock object.
    Setup
    Repopulate the database with test data
    StaffLoginController
    Controller class for the staff login interface.
    StockException
    Exception throw if there is an error in accessing the stock list
    StockManagementController
    Controller class for the stock management interface.
    StockManagementModel
    Model class for the stock management interface.
    StockR
    Implementation of the StockReader interface for database operations.
    StockReader
    Interface for reading product information from the stock database.
    StockReadWriter
    Interface for read/write access to the stock list.
    StockRW
    Stock Read-Write implementation for database operations.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object for user authentication operations.
    View
    View class for initializing and displaying the main application window.
